medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started 1.5 weeks ago, initially as vague discomfort and has progressively worsened over the past 3 weeks to significant pain that has been persistent for the last 2 days. The patient has been unable to keep any food down for several days, and has not had a bowel movement or passed flatus in the last 2 days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of gastric ulcers, history of HIV with CD4 count greater than 1000.
medical_history.family_history: Mother: hyperlipidemia, heart murmur; Father: prostate cancer, diabetes mellitus; No family history of gastrointestinal illness.
